description:
Feel home in midtown!!!
Five minutes walk to Times Square,Hell's kitchen area,2 minutes walk to all subway lines,
eventually minutes walk to most of amazing tourist area.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

In our floor there are 6 small studio each with private bathroom and private entry.  There is no kitchen inside of the each studio but each has their own small refrigerator,microwave, kettle ,coffee maker and dishes.
There is also a big common kitchen area that has also lundry.
The guest doesn't access to kitchen for cooking but they allow to use the lundry.
name: comfortable place in heart of Manhattan!!!
review: Great spot, easy check in and check out.
